entry.title: Bitcoin Knots 28.1.knots20250305 released
entry.summary:
The latest version of Bitcoin Knots, 28.1.knots20250305, is now accessible for download at [Bitcoin Knots' official website](https://bitcoinknots.org/files/28.x/28.1.knots20250305/). This update brings with it an assortment of new features aimed at enhancing the user experience, alongside various bug fixes and performance improvements that contribute to the overall stability and efficiency of the software. Users are encouraged to contribute to the project's development by reporting any encountered bugs through the issue tracker found on [GitHub](https://github.com/bitcoinknots/bitcoin/issues).
For individuals interested in staying informed about future announcements and updates regarding Bitcoin Knots, there is an option to join the mailing list available at [Bitcoin Knots Announcements](https://bitcoinknots.org/list/announcements/join/). Furthermore, detailed information regarding the specifics of this release can be found in the full release notes provided at [GitHub Release Notes](https://github.com/bitcoinknots/bitcoin/blob/v28.1.knots20250305/doc/release-notes.md). This release underscores the continuous efforts of the development team to refine and advance the Bitcoin Knots software, ensuring it remains a reliable and effective tool for users within the Bitcoin community.
